resources.name: 988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline
resources.description: 24/7 free and confidential support for people in distress. Call, text, or chat 988 for immediate help with suicide, mental health, or substance use crisis.

resources.name: Crisis Text Line
resources.description: Free 24/7 support via text. Text HOME to 741741 to connect with a trained crisis counselor for any type of crisis situation.
